name: Japanese Industry Standard Text
summary: Learn about .JIS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: JWPce is a Japanese text editor and dictionary application that can open JIS files. It is only available for Windows.

description: A JIS file is a text file that contains characters encoded with Japanese Industry Standards (JIS) encoding. It may be encoded with one of several JIS coded character sets, which includes JIS X 0201, 0202, 0212, and 0213, but is most commonly encoded in the JIS X 0208 kanji character set.
